result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for implementing a client to interact with the Moralis Solana API, handling data structures for token balances, NFT details, and token prices.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, separating client implementation and data models to facilitate interaction with the Moralis Solana API.

internal/infras/moralis_solana/client.go.purpose: This file implements a client for interacting with the Moralis Solana API, providing methods to retrieve balances, NFT items, and token prices.
side_effects: Makes HTTP requests to external API endpoints
risks: Potential for nil pointer dereference if API responses are not handled correctly
Error handling may expose sensitive information in error messages

internal/infras/moralis_solana/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures for interacting with the Moralis Solana API, including token balances, NFT details, and token prices.
